level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This chapter shall apply to contracts issued or renewed by health insurers on or after January 16, 2002.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition, see ยง 5 of Continuation of Health Coverage Temporary Act of 2002 (D.C. Law 14-108, April 13, 2002, law notification 49 DCR 4056).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-149
level.text: For Law 14-149, see notes following ยง 32-731.
